altTitles.en: Θέλω να μου κάνεις μία αηδιαστική γκριμάτσα και να μου δείξεις τα εσώρουχα σου: Θέλω να δω τα εσώρο&u
I Want You To Make a Disgusted Face and Show Me Your Underwear: I Want to See Your Underwear
I Want You To Show Me Your Panties With a Disgusted Face
Iya na Kao Sarenagara Opantsu Misete Moraitai
Iya na Kao Sarenagara Opantsu Misete moraitai: Yo wa Pantsu ga Mitai zo
Quiero que me muestres tus panties con una cara disgustada
嫌な顔されながらおパンツ見せてもらいたい ～余はパンツが見たいぞ～
싫은 얼굴을 하면서 팬티 보여줬으면 한다 ~짐은 팬티가 보고 싶다~

description.en:
Do you like girls who would show you their panties even if they look disgusted?  
Super rich, a genius, and good at all kinds of sports.  
A man who had no interest in the opposite sex had suddenly gained an urge to see panties one day.  
The maid of his house, a junior high school girl classmate, an onee-san from the bookstore– He's not going to stop until he sees their panties!  
A genius who is serious about seeing panties goes full throttle! The “flag” breaking type of comedy doesn’t stop!  
"I want to see some panties!"  
  
- [Original Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/40hara)  
- [WN Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5826ff/)

---

Español:  
||  
Súper rico, un genio, y bueno en todo tipo de deportes.  
  
Un hombre que no tenía ningún interés en el sexo opuesto había ganado repentinamente un impulso de ver bragas un día. La criada de su casa, una compañera de clase de secundaria, un señor de la librería… ¡No va a parar hasta que vea sus bragas!  
||
